text: [Oh dear, oh dear! I'm so late, and now this!] (tries to open the door) Mary Ann! Mary Ann! Fetch me my gloves this moment!
[I can't get in! What am I to do?] Then I'll go round and get in at the window.
[What in the world is going on?] Pat! Pat! Where are you?
[Apples? At a time like this?] Digging for apples, indeed! Here! Come and help me out of this!
[What is that monstrous thing?] Now tell me, Pat, what's that in the window?
[An arm? Impossible!] An arm, you goose! Who ever saw one that size? Why, it fills the whole window!
[This is unacceptable!] Well, it's got no business there, at any rate: go and take it away!
[I must start the proceedings properly.] (blows trumpet) The Queen of Hearts, she made some tarts, All on a summer day: The Knave of Hearts, he stole those tarts And took them quite away!
[That's too soon!] Not yet, not yet! There's a great deal to come before that!
[I must announce properly.] (blows trumpet) First witness!
